name: unwinnable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a competition, election, fight, etc. is unwinnable, it is not possible to win it: Why are you wasting your time and energy in fighting an unwinnable battle? He believed that the war was unwinnable and they should seek a peace agreement.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is generally agreed now that the war was unwinnable.She was a brilliant lawyer who won many apparently unwinnable cases.The Conservatives even won some seats that had been considered unwinnable at the start of the campaign.
